text: (maṉatil nāṭṭamiṉṟi, poy illāmal aṭikkaṭi nīṅkaḷ ceyyum) vīṇāṉa cattiyaṅkaḷukkāka allāh uṅkaḷai kuṟṟam piṭippatillai. Āṉāl, uṅkaḷ uḷḷaṅkaḷ (uṟutiyuṭaṉ) ceyyum cattiyaṅkaḷukkāka, (atai nīṅkaḷ niṟaivēṟṟavillaiyāyiṉ) avaṉ uṅkaḷai kuṟṟam piṭippāṉ. Allāh (kuṟṟaṅkaḷai) mikka maṉṉippavaṉ, atikam poṟumai uṭaiyavaṉ āvāṉ
